title: Analysis of the Impact of Visual Realism in Technology-Enhanced Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners engage in experiment-based assessments using various tools to visualize math concepts in a BYOD environment. The core objective is analyzing the impact of visual realism levels on learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of visual realism levels on information retention when expressing mathematical concepts
Learners can evaluate the interaction between visual realism and test types through experimental design
Learners can propose educational effects of verbal explanations to supplement visual realism
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
